quips: It rarely occurs to us to interrogate the ontological pedigrees of the things to which we are accustomed.
Don't only practice your art, but force your way into its secrets, for it and knowledge can raise one to the divine
The world tomorrow will belong to those who brought it the greatest hope.
I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
Man as animal is violent but as spirit is nonviolent. The moment he awakes to the spirit within he cannot remain violent.
Only the crystal-clear question yields a transparent answer.
Give us wisdom that we may know each other and not despise each other.
He who asks a question is a fool for a minute; he who does not remains a fool forever.
If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
The obscure we see eventually. The completely obvious, it seems, takes longer.
Hatred does not cease by hatred, only by love; this is the eternal rule.
All progress is precarious, and the solution of one problem brings us face to face with another problem.
The teacher and the taught together provide the teaching.
Do or do not; there is no try.
'All conditioned things are impermanent' -- when one sees this with wisdom, one turns away from suffering.
